code-runner.executorMap.cpp: powershell -Command "cd $dir; g++ $fileName -o temp.exe; ./temp.exe; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Remove-Item temp.exe -Force"
code-runner.executorMap.c: powershell -Command "cd $dir; gcc $fileName -o temp.exe; ./temp.exe; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Remove-Item temp.exe -Force"
